caption:
Hello Beautiful!

The sun ☀️ was shining here in the U.K. today and we had so much fun putting this little video together for you at our flagship salon in Maidenhead.

With our NEW silicone-free thermal care products I wanted to share with you how I recommend you use all our Babassu’s for the perfect pre-styling solution for the ultimate protection and hydration for your curls. Yesterday my hair was straight. Today bounced right back to curly with the help of this beautiful combination.

After applying these on soaking wet hair I then smoothed in Papaya Slip Taming Potion 🧪 and then the Bamboo Ginseng Curling Glaze. Diffused on high and left most of the cast in.

I took 2 years to test and develop these formulations. Green chemistry keeps evolving so I have the opportunity to bring only the best most efficacious ingredients that are high performing and reliable for you always. 

I hope you find this helpful. Any questions drop them below.

With love,

Keisha Jo xx
